text: Sabaku no Arabu-tachi wa,`watashi-tachi wa shinkō shimasu.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa shinjite wa inai. Tada “watashi-tachi wa nyūshin shimashita” to itte iru dake de, shinkō wa mada anata gata no kokoronouchi ni haitte wa inai. Moshi anata gataga, arrā to sono shito ni shitagaunara, kare wa sono okonai ni tsuite, sukoshi mo (hōshō o) keigen sa reru koto wanai. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
